mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (user_id, user_pw, user_name, user_age, user_address, user_phonenum, user_email, user_rate) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{user_pw}, #{user_name}, #{user_age}, #{user_address}, #{user_phonenum}, #{user_email}, 4)
mapper.select: SELECT user_id "user_id", user_pw "user_pw", user_name "user_name", user_age "user_age", user_address "user_address", user_phonenum "user_phonenum", user_email "user_email", user_rate "user_rate", TO_CHAR(user_regdate) "user_regdate" FROM users WHERE user_id=#{value}

SELECT user_id "user_id", user_pw "user_pw", user_name "user_name", user_age "user_age", user_address "user_address", user_phonenum "user_phonenum", user_email "user_email", user_rate "user_rate", TO_CHAR(user_regdate) "user_regdate" FROM users WHERE user_email=#{value}
